title: Crocodile main schema file
description: Top level schema file for graphical engine

global-font-instances.description: this is not supposed to be defined by user!

parent-id.description: Should not be set by the user

children-ids.description: Should not be set by the user

entity-id.description: Should not be set by the user

parent-id.description: Should not be set by the user

children-ids.description: Should not be set by the user

entity-id.description: Should not be set by the user

parent-id.description: Should not be set by the user

children-ids.description: Should not be set by the user
Integer list of children ids defined in 'children' property

color-format.description:
specification for color format for a-transforms and fonts it is either
hexcolor, or array of integers [0, 255], or array of floats [0.0, 1.0] one
should never mix types in a single array - this will not pass the
validation using this schema (intentionally) this is illegal -> [155, 255,
255, 0.1]

alpha-format.description:
format specification for alpha value in a-transforms
it can either be a number between 0 and 1 or a string containing number
from 0 to 1

scale-format.description:
format specification for scale value in a-transforms
it can either be a number, a string, an array of strings or an array of
integers
if array of strings is given, validators (not yaml schema) will check if
the string values are legal
there are no restrictions on values given

translate-linear-format.description:
format specification for linear translation in a-transform
it can either be a number, a string, an array of strings or an array of
numbers

scenario-guid.description: Scenario-guid should not be set by the user

texture-guid.description: texture-guid should not be set by the user

type.description:
single-instance-minmap -> generiraj minmap za vse texture v tem atlasu
per-language -> vsak jezik bo imel svoj atlas
single-instance -> vsi prevodi so shranjeni v enem atlasu
